LanguageData.VCE_Plant_AloeVera.label: алое вера
LanguageData.VCE_Plant_AloeVera.description: A cultivated succulent with thick, greenish, fleshy leaves that fan out from the short stem. Whilst not as beautiful as flowers, this plant has a very long lifespan.
LanguageData.VCE_Plant_BunnyEarsCactus.label: опунція дрібноволоса
LanguageData.VCE_Plant_BunnyEarsCactus.description: A cultivated succulent with pads resembling ears of a bunny, and spines resembling fuzzy fur. Whilst not as beautiful as flowers, this plant has a very long lifespan.
LanguageData.VCE_Plant_Echeveria.label: ечеверія
LanguageData.VCE_Plant_Echeveria.description: A cultivated succulent forming a rosette, native to arid shrublands. Whilst not as beautiful as flowers, this plant has a very long lifespan.
LanguageData.VCE_Plant_FairyWashboard.label: гавортія ліміфолія
LanguageData.VCE_Plant_FairyWashboard.description: A cultivated succulent with rosette forming long triangular leaves. Whilst not as beautiful as flowers, this plant has a very long lifespan.
LanguageData.VCE_Plant_JadePlant.label: товстянка овальна
LanguageData.VCE_Plant_JadePlant.description: A cultivated succulent with thick, woody stems and oval-shaped leaves. Whilst not as beautiful as flowers, this plant has a very long lifespan.
LanguageData.VCE_Plant_PeyotePlant.label: пейот
LanguageData.VCE_Plant_PeyotePlant.description: A cultivated succulent resembling thick buttons. Whilst not as beautiful as flowers, this plant has a very long lifespan.
LanguageData.VCE_Plant_PincushionPlant.label: скабіоза
LanguageData.VCE_Plant_PincushionPlant.description: A cultivated succulent of cactus variety, with pointy spikes covering its exterior. Whilst not as beautiful as flowers, this plant has a very long lifespan.
LanguageData.VCE_Plant_Schlumbergera.label: шлюмбергера
LanguageData.VCE_Plant_Schlumbergera.description: A cultivated succulent with bell-shaped flowers. Whilst not as beautiful as flowers, this plant has a very long lifespan.
LanguageData.VCE_Plant_SnakePlant.label: сансев'єрія
LanguageData.VCE_Plant_SnakePlant.description: A cultivated succulent with stiff, green banded leaves with a yellow border. Whilst not as beautiful as flowers, this plant has a very long lifespan.
LanguageData.VCE_Plant_SweetheartPlant.label: коханець
LanguageData.VCE_Plant_SweetheartPlant.description: A cultivated succulent with heart-shaped leaves on a tall stem. Whilst not as beautiful as flowers, this plant has a very long lifespan.
